Represents an NFL team that is available for Contestant to Select as a Pick.
Pre-defined, static content (barring any changes to the NFL itself).

- ID `primary key`
- Location `string`
- Name `string`
- Shorthand `string`

## Example
```
{
	"id": <unique auto-generated ID>,
	"location": "Arizona",
	"name": "Cardinals",
	"shorthand": "ARI"
}
```
